Class CustomerController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sales.controllers.CustomerController

  • @Controller
public class CustomerController
extends java.lang.Object
    Customer controller which handles all customer functionality
    Author:
    Matthew Sloyan G00348036

    • Method Detail

      • showCustomers

        @RequestMapping(value="/showCustomers")
public java.lang.String showCustomers(org.springframework.ui.Model m)
        Gets ArrayList of Customers from service, and adds to model to be displayed in view when /showCustomers page is loaded
        Parameters:
        m - Model which is used to add list of customers to jsp view
        Returns:
        string of .jsp page to be loaded
        See Also:
        CustomerService

      • addNewCustomer

        @RequestMapping(value="/addCustomer",
                method=GET)
public java.lang.String addNewCustomer(@ModelAttribute(value="customer")
                                                                                                           Customer cust)
        Get and display addCustomer when navigated to, this page allows the user to add a customer
        Parameters:
        cust - Customer model which is the object bound to the form, and is used to get data from the form
        Returns:
        string of .jsp page to be loaded

      • newCustomerAdded

        @RequestMapping(value="/addCustomer",
                method=POST)
public java.lang.String newCustomerAdded(@ModelAttribute(value="customer")
                                                                                                              Customer cust,
                                                                                                              org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result)
        Post request which is called on submit of form.
        Parameters:
        cust - Customer model which is the object bound to the form, and is used to get data from the form
        result - Used in validation of form inputs, e.g displays error message if fields are empty.
        Returns:
        string of .jsp page to be loaded using redirect so if page is refreshed it won't call add method again.
        See Also:
        CustomerService

      • editBook

        @RequestMapping(value="/editCustomer/{cId}",
                method=GET)
public java.lang.String editBook(@ModelAttribute(value="customer")
                                                                                                            Customer cust,
                                                                                                            @PathVariable(value="cId")
                                                                                                            java.lang.String cId,
                                                                                                            org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        Get and display editCustomer when navigated to, this page allows the user to edit a customers details which are pre-loaded and added to the form using the cId passed in the url
        Parameters:
        cust - Customer model which is the object bound to the form, and is used to get data from the form
        cId - gets the string from the url
        m - Model which is used to add old customer data to jsp view
        Returns:
        string of .jsp page to be loaded.
        See Also:
        CustomerService

      • editedBook

        @RequestMapping(value="/editCustomer/{cId}",
                method=POST)
public java.lang.String editedBook(@ModelAttribute(value="customer")
                                                                                                               Customer cust,
                                                                                                               @PathVariable(value="cId")
                                                                                                               java.lang.String cId,
                                                                                                               org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result)
        Post request which is called on submit of form. This gets the values from the form and is used to update the database using the new inputs.
        Parameters:
        cust - Customer model which is the object bound to the form, and is used to get data from the form
        cId - gets the string from the url
        result - Used in validation of form inputs, however doesn't seem to work for updates
        Returns:
        string of .jsp page to be loaded using redirect so if page is refreshed it won't call add method again.
        See Also:
        CustomerService
